title: I uninstalled League after being stuck in a loop of "We will restore a backup" and now
body:
I cannot reinstall League

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/144910154733715457/377927045168234497/2cf83149ef7f540e03a39d4e806e8ad1.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/144910154733715457/377926556598927360/3804a280373f8be5539aabcd5e5d22a9.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/144910154733715457/377924577868775424/a4d91faedec120c4d6ffa4df2ac21a18.png

This kept on happening at first so I just decided to uninstall League and reinstall to see if it would be fixed, but I can't download it now.

This keeps happening

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/144910154733715457/377934588917448717/3f1c1f22aea283908641efbc008d1c8c.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/144910154733715457/377934548903919616/489edba6c9bf7fcecd2de8a76b2a70d1.png

Also I can't find LeagueClient.exe in my files and when I use hextech repair tool to reinstall it keeps on asking for it.

replies.body: You might be having a security setting now allowing your files to update properly, and the folder can't be accessed.  Double check your anti-virus settings and run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up and restore that access.

https://i.gyazo.com/ca2ff6f28b7a59ec21c4c8ecc4662800.png
https://i.gyazo.com/18afc22aa705b7c4ac3ea24ce622b501.png
https://i.gyazo.com/3e41b31b9f054ae39e79807f996e51ea.png
https://i.gyazo.com/b00a3ab9b37779769d271ef6ad35aa05.png
It's giving me this now, I've turned off my anti-virus but nothing is working?
